destination.description: it is a 33 byte, hex-encoded, node ID of the node that the payment should go to

payment_hash.description: it is the unique identifier of a payment

amount_msat.description: the amount to send in millisatoshi precision; it can be a whole number, or a whole number with suffix `msat` or `sat`, or a three decimal point number with suffix `sat`, or an 1 to 11 decimal point number suffixed by `btc`
